---
title: "UploadFileAction"
description: "Upload file to interactive element with file path"
---

Use with any upload file element, including button, input, a, span, div. CRITICAL: Use only this for file upload, do not use click.

**Example:**
```python
from notte_sdk import actions

session.execute(actions.UploadFile(selector="file-input", file_path="/path/to/document.pdf"))
session.execute(actions.UploadFile(selector="image-upload", file_path="./image.jpg"))
```
